subject: p16848073
Findings: In comparison with the study of, the pulmonary vascular congestion has decreased. Opacification at the right base is again consistent with effusion and volume loss. Less prominent effusion and atelectasis is seen at the left base. Right chest tube remains in place without pneumothorax. Extensive opacification in the right paratracheal region is consistent with the known invasive esophageal tumor.
